verses.verse: And <WG2532> you <WG5209> has he made alive <WG5607>, who were dead <WG3498> in trespasses <WG3900> and <WG2532> sins <WG266>;

Where <WG3739> in <WG1722> times past <WG4218> you walked <WG4043> according to <WG2596> the course <WG165> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889>, according to <WG2596> the prince <WG758> of the power <WG1849> of the air <WG109>, the spirit <WG4151> that <WG3588> now <WG3568> works <WG1754> in <WG1722> the sons <WG5207> of disobedience <WG543>:

Among <WG1722> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> we <WG2249> all <WG3956> lived <WG390> in times past <WG4218> in <WG1722> the lusts <WG1939> of our <WG2257> flesh <WG4561>, fulfilling <WG4160> the desires <WG2307> of the flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> of the mind <WG1271>; and <WG2532> were <WG1510> by nature <WG5449> the sons <WG5043> of wrath <WG3709>, even <WG2532> as <WG5613> others <WG3062>.
But <WG1161> God <WG2316>, who is <WG5607> rich <WG4145> in <WG1722> mercy <WG1656>, for <WG1223> his <WG846> great <WG4183> love <WG26> with which <WG3739> he loved <WG25> us <WG2248>,
Even <WG2532> when <WG5607> we <WG2248> were <WG5607> dead <WG3498> in sins <WG3900>, has made us alive together with <WG4806> Christ <WG5547>, (by grace <WG5485> you are <WG2075> saved <WG4982>;)
And <WG2532> has raised <WG4891> us up together <WG4891>, and <WG2532> made <WG4776> us sit together <WG4776> in <WG1722> heavenly <WG2032> places in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>:

That <WG2443> in <WG1722> the ages <WG165> to come <WG1904> he might show <WG1731> the exceeding <WG5235> riches <WG4149> of his <WG846> grace <WG5485> in <WG1722> his kindness <WG5544> toward <WG1909> us <WG2248> through <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

For <WG1063> by grace <WG5485> are <WG2075> you saved <WG4982> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102>; and <WG2532> that <WG5124> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> yourselves <WG5216>: it is the gift <WG1435> of God <WG2316>:
Not <WG3756> of <WG1537> works <WG2443>, lest <WG3361> any man <WG5100> should boast <WG2744>.

For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> his <WG846> workmanship <WG4161>, created <WG2936> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> unto <WG1909> good <WG18> works <WG2041>, which <WG3739> God <WG2316> has before ordained <WG4282> that <WG2443> we should walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> them <WG846>.

Therefore <WG1352> remember <WG3421>, that <WG3754> you <WG5210> being in time past <WG4218> Gentiles <WG1484> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, who are <WG3588> called <WG3004> Uncircumcision <WG203> by <WG5259> that which is <WG3588> called <WG3004> the Circumcision <WG4061> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> made by hands <WG5499>;

That <WG3754> at <WG1722> that <WG1565> time <WG2540> you were <WG2258> outside <WG5565> of Christ <WG5547>, being aliens <WG526> from the commonwealth <WG4174> of Israel <WG2474>, and <WG2532> strangers <WG3581> from the covenants <WG1242> of promise <WG1860>, having <WG2192> no <WG3361> hope <WG1680>, and <WG2532> without God <WG112> in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>:

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> you <WG5210> who <WG3588> sometimes <WG4218> were <WG5607> far off <WG3112> are made <WG1096> near <WG1451> by <WG1722> the blood <WG129> of Christ <WG5547>.

For <WG1063> he <WG846> is <WG2076> our <WG2257> peace <WG1515>, who <WG3588> has made <WG4160> both <WG297> one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> has broken down <WG3089> the middle wall <WG3320> of partition between us <WG5418>;

Having abolished <WG2673> in <WG1722> his <WG846> flesh <WG4561> the enmity <WG2189>, even the law <WG3551> of commandments <WG1785> contained in <WG1722> ordinances <WG1378>; for <WG1519> to <WG2443> make <WG2936> in <WG1722> himself <WG1438> of two <WG1417> one <WG1520> new <WG2537> man <WG444>, so making <WG4160> peace <WG1515>;

And <WG2532> that he <WG846> might reconcile <WG604> both <WG297> unto God <WG2316> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> body <WG4983> by <WG1223> the cross <WG4716>, having slain <WG615> the enmity <WG2189> thereby <WG1722>:
And <WG2532> came <WG2064> and preached <WG2097> peace <WG1515> to you <WG5213> which were <WG3588> afar off <WG3112>, and <WG2532> to them that were <WG3588> near <WG1451>.
For <WG3754> through <WG1223> him <WG846> we <WG2192> both <WG297> have <WG2192> access <WG4318> by <WG1722> one <WG1520> Spirit <WG4151> unto <WG4314> the Father <WG3962>.

Now <WG3767> therefore <WG686> you are <WG2075> no more <WG3765> strangers <WG3581> and <WG2532> foreigners <WG3941>, but <WG235> fellowcitizens <WG4847> with the saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> of the household <WG3609> of God <WG2316>;

And are built <WG2026> upon <WG1909> the foundation <WG2310> of the apostles <WG652> and <WG2532> prophets <WG4396>, Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> himself <WG846> being <WG5607> the chief corner stone <WG204>;
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> all <WG3956> the building <WG3619> fitly framed together <WG4883> grows <WG837> into <WG1519> a holy <WG40> temple <WG3485> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>:
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> you <WG5210> also <WG2532> are built together <WG4925> for <WG1519> a habitation <WG2732> of God <WG2316> through <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>.
